name: BloodAid
tagline: Android Application on Blood donation with GPS
body: # BloodAid Android Application on Blood donation along with GPS tracking of Donors and Notifications through Email. ## Getting Started These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes. --> Have a basic Knowledge on Android Development. --> Have a basic Knowledge on PHP and working with Mysql server. --> Be Confident to deal with errors "Nothing is Impossible everything can be done". See deployment for notes on how to deploy the project on a live system. ### Prerequisites "Android Studio" Download: https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html "Wamp Server" Download :http://www.wampserver.com/en/ ### Installing INSTALL Both Android Studio and Wamp server. ``` BE sure both are working Prefectly ``` ## Running the project Once both are installed Download the code from my page in [github/BloodAid](https://github.com/sairam27/BloodAID) or from my Google Drive : https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B-p1H9iIerKaY2o3Q0VEU3F6d2s 1.Copy android_login_api folder to "C:\wamp64\www\.."folder. 2.copy BloodAid folder on to "C:\Users\username\AndroidStudioProjects\.."folder. 3.Now open android Studio and open BloodAid project from the above directory. 4.once compile the entire project. 5.once check weather the wamp server is running or not and check the php file from server. 6.open the file "C:\Users\username\AndroidStudioProjects\BloodAID\app\src\main\java\ravis\bloodaid\app\AppConfig.java". 7.edit the ip address to your wamp server address. 8.open phpmyadmin in local server 1. create a new database android_api. 2. execute the command present in "C:\wamp64\www\android_login_api\db\database.sql" on sql in phpmyadmin in android_api database. 9.Run the BloodAid project on Emulator. 10.check weather the project working correctly or not. ## Screenshots of Project Working ## Usage * Android material design, Android Fragments,JSON Parsers, Google maps Api, PHP, PHP mailer, SQLite, Mysql server # If u get error in Google maps Api generate your Api key from : : : https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/android-api/map and apply maps api key to project. ## Authors * **KOLLURU SAIRAM** - *Initial work* - [BloodAid](https://github.com/sairam27/BloodAID) ## For Queries * email:ravi.sairam27@gmail.com * alt email:ravi.sairam97@live.com * phone no.: 9160545192
